Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the fact that Suge Knight was stabbed to death in prison, when in reality, it was a false report.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Suge Knight was still incarcerated at the Los Angeles County Jail at the time of the claim, awaiting trial on different charges.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false report from a disreputable website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information provided in the false report is true without verifying its credibility.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations or possibilities, such as the false nature of the report and the motives behind spreading such misinformation.
